segments.text: I heard that Kevin got divorced . Is that true ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not so bad , but Kevin does have problems with his wife .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: His wife always complained that Kevin's salary was too low and got no promotion .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Poor Kevin , we should do something for him . He is a nice guy and does his job well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I agree with you . But you know , it's just one of those things .
segments.speaker: S2
